About the job
Our Employee Value Proposition
Advancing our People.
Advancing our World.

At CrimsonLogic, we put your Career and Well-being first.
We are committed to advancing your career through a full spectrum of professional Development programs with the support of a strong Total Rewards philosophy that focus on your well-being.
We believe that by investing in each and every one of our employees‚Äô professional and personal growth, we can collectively make a positive impact on the world as we strive for greatness together in a nurturing and inclusive workplace.

Role Purpose(s)
Application development, enhancement, maintenance and support for next generation Tuas Terminal Operating System (GTOS+2.0).

Key Accountabilities
Work closely with stakeholders to gather business requirements and translate them into functional requirement specifications.
Manage and support the Software Development Life Cycle (‚ÄúSDLC‚Äù) of assigned project(s) from initialization to closure.
Work closely with vendors to ensure successful software system delivery and technical feasibility.
Conduct System Integration Testing (‚ÄúSIT‚Äù), User Acceptance Testing (‚ÄúUAT‚Äù) and System Implementation and Deployment.
Ensure technical solution supports the business requirements.
Perform system troubleshooting

Job Responsibilities & Duties
Provide 24√ó7 system support in a team-based setting.
Willing to travel down to data centres and endpoint deployment sites when needed to support troubleshooting and remediation of issues
Perform any other duties as assigned by the supervisor or management to support departmental goals and business needs.
Any other duties assigned

Key Job Competencies
Interpersonal Savvy
Result Oriented
Learning Agility
Continuous Improvement

Education Requirements
Degree in Computing, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems or equivalent

Skills Required
Must-have skills
Proficient in programming (JAVA / C / C++)
Oracle / SQL
Hands on experience in frameworks like Angular, Spring Boot; Cloud Foundry or similar cloud technology
Proficiency in Agile Methodologies
Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Continuous Integration (CI)

Preferable skills
Hands on experience in frameworks like Angular, Spring Boot; Cloud Foundry or similar cloud technology.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Agile Methodologies, such as Extreme Programming (XP) and Scrum
Knowledge of software best practices, like Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Continuous Integration (CI)

Fresh grads are welcomed to apply!

CrimsonLogic is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We hire talented and passionate people of all backgrounds and create an inclusive workplace for all employees to develop and build their career with us.
About the company
CrimsonLogic
98,936 followers
Follow
IT Services and IT Consulting 1,001-5,000 employees 1,256 on LinkedIn
CrimsonLogic, a wholly-owned subsidiary of PSA International, is a global technology company driven by innovation to digitally transform and simplify global trade.

With over 36 years of experience worldwide, CrimsonLogic specializes in technology-enablement in the fields of trade facilitation, customs clearance automation, AI-driven supply chain optimization, port operations and government services. We offer next-generation IID, ACE and ACI eManifest software for U.S. and Canadian customs, along with our advanced port community system, Global PORTNET¬Æ.

As a trusted partner to businesses, logistics service providers, governments, port and terminal operators, our tailored solutions are designed to meet the unique needs of every client, enabling seamless and secure optimization of supply chains and operations.

Having pioneered the world's first single window trade facilitation system for Singapore, CrimsonLogic continues to drive digital transformation in global trade via cutting-edge technology, exemplified by the successful implementation of innovation solutions in over 40 countries worldwide.

üîî Follow us on LinkedIn for the latest in trade tech, customs innovation and port digitalization.
